review: I love my chromecast.  I have used a wide variety of different streaming devices (Roku, Samsung, neotv) and this is one of my favorites and I think it is the best for the price.  It streams Netflix, Youtube, and Hulu without any problems.  The only downside is that it can be difficult to stream amazon prime videos and videos from your amazon library.  It can be done but it takes some effort and is super draining on the phone/tablet battery, to the point where it's not even worth it.  For the cost I think it is one of the better streaming devices.
author: Sara
